features.name: Lightning Medium
features.description: If you are active, when hit by a melee attack made of metal or a natural attack, you deal 3 (1d6) lightning damage back.

features.name: Where is the switch!?
features.description: A creature trained in tinker's tools, lockpicking tools or an artificer may use its action to try and turn off the device. They may roll a tinker's tool, lockpicking tools or intelligence check DC 12 to turn off the machine. You need to enter in contact with the device to do so and are subject to the Lightning medium feature at before every attempt.

features.name: Lightning Arc
features.description: The closest creature in 30 ft. must make a DC 13 dex or take 1d6+2 lightning damage and have disadvantage on all actions until the end of its next turn.
